propertyGroup.name: Outlets
propertyGroup.documentation: Defines the locations to which output is generated.

property.name: output
property.documentation: The location to which any controllers are generated (this outlet contains classes which are fully generated and should not be touched).

property.name: services
property.documentation: The location to which any services are generated (this outlet contains classes which are fully generated and should not be touched).

property.name: service-impls
property.documentation: The location to which any services implementations that the must be edited

property.name: views
property.documentation: Where the application views are output.
